basic.name: Ravage (Q)
basic.description: Leap to a target, dealing 130 damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

basic.name: Impaling Blades (W)
basic.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area, Stunning them for 1 second.

basic.name: Primal Grasp (E)
basic.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 195 damage to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Maelstrom (R)
heroic.description: Deals 74 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

heroic.name: Summon Ultralisk (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

trait.name: Assimilation (T)
trait.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.Current maximum: 1004

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 100 points of Assimilation Shields.

1.name: Assimilation Mastery
1.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 50 points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

1.name: Fury of the Swarm
1.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

4.name: Sharpened Blades
4.description: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
4.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2 seconds after its first explosion.

7.name: Queen of Blades
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Ravage by 3 seconds and increase its damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.

7.name: Boundless Fury
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.name: Psionic Barrier
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor and 4% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20% Movement Speed.

13.name: Volatile Power
13.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

13.name: Chrysalis
13.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.name: Mounting Potency
16.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

16.name: Painful Spikes
16.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

16.name: Unbridled Energy
16.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: Increase the Health and Basic Attack damage of the Ultralisk by 20%.  The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Assimilation Blades
20.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.
